thread.title: Two Melbourne, Florida Marriott Hotels Aim To Keep NIFA Travelers Comfortable with Amazing Amenities
thread.title_full: Two Melbourne, Florida Marriott Hotels Aim To Keep NIFA Travelers Comfortable with Amazing Amenities - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Two Melbourne, Florida Marriott Hotels Aim To Keep NIFA Travelers Comfortable with Amazing Amenities
text:
Courtyard Melbourne West; Residence Inn Melbourne
Guests of Courtyard Melbourne West and Residence Inn Melbourne will enjoy close proximity to Melbourne International Airport during this year's Region 9 SAFECON 2015
MELBOURNE, Fla. , Sept. 18, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Travelers heading to Melbourne for the National Intercollegiate Flying Association Region 9 SAFECON 2015 will be on cloud nine when it comes to comfort and convenience thanks to accommodations at Courtyard Melbourne West and Residence Inn Melbourne .
The National Intercollegiate Flying Association , founded in 1920, serves as a platform for collegiate aviators to further their studies and careers by participating in competitive and non-competitive events, networking with others in the industry and applying themselves to go above and beyond their curriculum.
Whether doing the flying or visiting as a spirited spectator, guests will appreciate returning to the hotels' spacious quarters with some of today's most desired amenities. Stay connected with family and friends with free high-speed Internet, and relax and unwind on cozy sofas in front of flat-panel TVs with premium movie channels. To soar to their maximum potential, visitors can take advantage of in-room coffee makers for that morning jolt of java. Residence Inn guests have the added bonus of having fully equipped kitchens in their rooms, perfect for whipping up a snack or light meal before or after a big event. The kitchens include a stovetop, refrigerator, dishwasher for quick cleanup, pots, pans, silverware and dishes.
Aviation aficionados at Courtyard can take off each morning with a variety of fresh and healthy breakfast choices, including specialty Starbucks® beverages at The Bistro- Eat. Drink. Connect.® With everything from cereal and fresh-cut fruit to thick-cut french toast and egg white frittatas, the menu is soaring with opportunities to fuel up. At Residence Inn, guests can enjoy a complimentary hot, American breakfast with each rise of the sun.
During downtime, outdoor swimming pools and fitness centers at each location give guests extra incentive to maintain their regular workout routines even while on vacation.
About Courtyard Melbourne West
Courtyard Melbourne West at 2101 W. New Haven Ave. in Melbourne, Florida is near Patrick Air Force Base, Eau Gallie Arts District and The Brevard Zoo. The hotel has 3 floors with 143 rooms, 12 suites, 2 meeting rooms with 1,274 square feet of total space, The Bistro – Eat. Drink. Connect.®, outdoor pool and fitness center. High-speed Internet access is complimentary. For information, visit www.MelbourneCourtyard.com or call 1-321-724-6400.
About Residence Inn Melbourne
Residence Inn Melbourne at 1430 S. Babcock St. in Melbourne, Florida is near Historic Downtown Melbourne , Eau Gallery District and The Brevard Zoo. The hotel features 6 floors with 133 suites, 1 meeting room with 345 square feet of space, an outdoor pool and fitness center. Daily breakfast and high-speed Internet access are complimentary. For information, visit www.MelbourneResidenceInn.com or call 1-312-723-5740.
